Module it.polimi.is24am05
Package it.polimi.is24am05.model.card.side

Interface Side

All Known Implementing Classes:
GoldBackSide, GoldFrontSide, ResourceBackSide, ResourceFrontSide, StarterBackSide, StarterFrontSide
public interface Side
Implemented by resource, gold and starter sides to enable polymorphism.

  • Method Details

    • hasCorner

      boolean hasCorner(Corner corner)
      Checks if a corner is present on this side, i.e. a card can cover the corner.
      Parameters:
      corner - the corner to check.
      Returns:
      true if the corner is present on this side, false otherwise.

    • getCorner

      List<Element> getCorner(Corner corner) throws InvalidCornerException
      Gets the elements inside the given corner of this side.

      As the center counts as a corner, the return type is set to a list to support starter front sides that have multiple elements at the center. All other sides will always return a list of length one.

      Parameters:
      corner - the corner to get.
      Returns:
      the elements inside the given corner of this side.
      Throws:
      InvalidCornerException - thrown if the corner is not present on this side, i.e. hasCorner returns false.

    • getPlacementPoints

      default int getPlacementPoints(PlayArea playArea)
      Gets the total points awarded after placing this side on the play area.

      It defaults to 0 and is overwritten by resource and gold front sides.

      Parameters:
      playArea - the play area where this side was placed.
      Returns:
      the total points awarded after placing this side on the play area.

    • getPlacementConditions

      default Map<Resource,Integer> getPlacementConditions()
      Returns:
      The placing condition for the specific side. An empty map if there are no conditions to satisfy.

    • getMultiplier

      default GoldCardMultiplier getMultiplier()

    • getSeed

      Resource getSeed()
      Returns:
      The Seed (resource) that the card is associated with. Null for StarterCard sides.

    • getPoints

      default int getPoints()
